# This turret can move with the function move(distance)!
move(1000)
if selfsensor():
	fire()
move(-1000)
print(selfsensor())
if selfsensor():
	fire()

def fib(n):
	a = 1
	b = 1
	while n > 2:
		temp = a
		a = a + b
		b = temp
		n = n - 1
	return a

def shootn(n):
	print("Shooting n times:")
	print(n)
	while n > 0: 
		shoot()
		n = n - 1

def cycle(n):
	move(1000)
	shootn(fib(n))
	move(-230)
	shootn(fib(n+1))
	move(-230)
	shootn(fib(n+2))
	move(-230)
	shootn(fib(n+3))
	
cycle(1)
cycle(5)
